Subject: [R&T] New OpenSSH Vulnerability Could Lead to RCE as Root on Linux Systems
Description: Hi Support, Can I check if the EPP system had the OpenSSH enabled ? If so, how do we patched this ? https://thehackernews.com/2024/07/new-openssh-vulnerability-could-lead-to.html?_m=3n%2e009a%2e3396%2eey0ao453s4%2e2ej8 Thanks, Milan Singh
Solution_Comment__c:
On Ubuntu 22 run this
sudo apt update
sudo apt install --no-install-recommends openssh-server openssh-client
sudo systemctl restart ssh
to address the open SSH issue
